Class Reader

java.lang.Object
Reader
public abstract class Reader extends Object
The reader classes has methods that will read the contents of files and convert them into Reservation and/or Cancellation objects.
Author:
Edison Cai 20241135

      public Reader()

  • Method Details

    • readReservations

      public static void readReservations(String filepath)
      Reads a file line-by-line, creates a Reservation object for all of them. They are placed in an ArrayList and will be passed into the ReservationCancellationManager.setAllReservations() method.
      Parameters:
      filepath - The file path of the file to be read from.

    • readCancellations

      public static void readCancellations(String filepath)
      Reads a file line-by-line, creates a Cancellation object for all of them. They are placed in an ArrayList and will be passed into the ReservationCancellationManager.setAllCancellations() method.
      Parameters:
      filepath - The file path of the file to be read from.

    • readUsers

      public static ArrayList<User> readUsers(String filepath)
      Reading list of admins. They are placed in an ArrayList and will be passed into the ReservationCancellationManager.setAllUsers() method.
      Parameters:
      filepath - File path to the list of admin usernames and passwords.
      Returns:
      A list of User objects gathered from the filepath.

    • lineToReservation

      private static Reservation lineToReservation(String[] cells)
